Commentary: Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, full and outside off, Smith drums it away to point. Can't find the gap
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, back of a length and slanted in, Smith plays back and is rapped on the thigh. But this is heading past leg stump
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run, full on the stumps, knocked into the leg side
Anwar Ali to Billings, no run, full inswinger, catches Billings on the move. He plays around the front pad and does not connect
Anwar Ali to Billings, 1 run, Billings shimmies out and bunts a length ball to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, just short of a good length on off, punched in the direction of midwicket
Umar Gul to Billings, FOUR, overpitched and outside off, Billings holds his shape, opens the face and threads the gap at cover with a sweet drive
Umar Gul to Billings, no run
Umar Gul to Billings, FOUR, pretty full and angled in on off, Billings flicks it away through the vacant spaces at midwicket
Umar Gul to Billings, 1 run, back of a length and slanted in on off, a whirl of the wrists as Billings hits towards midwicket
Umar Gul to Smith, 1 run, full and angled in on off, pushed to mid-on running in
Umar Gul to Billings, no run, length ball on off, negotiated a straight bat
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run, Smith backs away outside leg, the bowler chases him, whipped to deep square leg
Anwar Ali to Billings, no run, short and outside off, leans back and chops to cover-point
Anwar Ali to Billings, 1 run, uses his feet, meets a full ball and pushes to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, full inswinger, inside-edged onto the pad
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, lifter on off, ducks under it
Anwar Ali to Smith, no run, full and outside off, driven to mid-off for a quick single
Perera to Billings, 1 run, slower delivery on off, forward and patted to point
Perera to Smith, no run, full and outside off, swish and a miss
Perera to Smith, 1 run, back of a length and angled in on off, jabbed to mid-on
Perera to Billings, 1 run, slower incutter, dabbed with soft hands to the leg side
Perera to Smith, no run, back of a length and angled in, hangs back and punches to midwicket
Perera to Smith, 1 run, slower full ball on off stump, Smith looks to launch it out of Sharjah. He can only miscue it to deep midwicket
Anwar Ali to Smith, 1 run, just short of a good length and outside off, forced to long-on
Anwar Ali to Billings, FOUR, Billings gallops down the track, the bowler had dragged his length back, but Billings still flat-batted it away past mid-off
Anwar Ali to Billings, FOUR, Billings goes over cover down. Steps out again, takes a short ball and muscles it over the top for back-to-back fours

Anwar Ali to Billings, no run, short and angled into the body, Billings aims to fend. The ball lobs to the leg side. Smith is too eager for the single. Billings isn't interested. Sends his partner back. The bowler hunts the ball down, Smith whips around, but Anwar attempts the throw, hitting Smith on the back. It was unintentional and thus the appeal for obstructing the field is shot down by umpire Dar
Anwar Ali to Billings, FOUR, full on the legs, flicked away handsomely square of short fine leg for four. Billings in fine touch
Anwar Ali to Billings, 1 run, another leg-side flick, this time for one
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, full and outside off, pushed to long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, FOUR, slides in with the arm, paddled away fine of short fine leg for four

Mohammad Nawaz to Smith, OUT, Nawaz strikes with his third ball. Slides in with the arm. Non-turning ball, which is not short enough for the short-arm pull. Smith does not connect. Nawaz barges into his castle and takes him down
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, skids on outside off, not short enough for the cut. Haddin misjudges it and gets away
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, no run, uses his feet, does not meet the pitch, and wears it on the pad
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, 1 leg bye, again, Haddin uses his feet, he is nowhere close to the pitch. Deflects the ball off the thigh to the leg side
Hasan Khan to Haddin, no run, chopped from off stump to short third man with an angled bat
Hasan Khan to Haddin, 1 run, short and spins away outside off, catches the outside edge and streaks away fine of short third man. Good save
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, slides in with the arm, the length is fuller, push-driven to long-on
Hasan Khan to Haddin, 1 run, full on the stumps, eased down to long-on
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, down the track and whips a full ball from off stump to deep midwicket
Hasan Khan to Haddin, no run, Haddin steps out, but is not close enough to the pitch. Poked back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, no run, starts on off and spins away, dabbed to point with soft hands
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, FOUR, Billings goes inside-out, beating long-off to his left. Twinkles down the track, collapses his back leg at the last instant and times it to perfection
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, down the track and clipped to wide long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, FOUR, tossed full on off, Haddin clears his front leg and hoists it over the bowler's head

Mohammad Nawaz to Haddin, OUT, Haddin nicks behind. Double-strike from Nawaz. Shortish and skids on outside off, Haddin backs away outside leg and only under-edges it behind to Sarfraz. The shot was probably on, the execution was iffy
Mohammad Nawaz to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, too full on middle, reverse-paddled from the stumps to short third man
Wicket: ['BJ Haddin c †Sarfraz Ahmed b Mohammad Nawaz 6 (9b 1x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, full and speared into the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, attacks the stumps, Misbah hangs back and nudges the ball through square leg
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, Billings skips out, but is beaten by turn. The outside edge dies in front of short third
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, Misbah goes low, sweeps from leg stump, but can't get it past short fine leg
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, Misbah steps away outside leg, Hasan follows him and raps him on the pad
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, skids into the pads, picked off to deep square leg for one
Umar Gul to Billings, no run, not short enough for a cut outside off. Billings slashes and does not make contact
Umar Gul to Billings, 1 run, length ball on off, allows the ball to come onto him, and runs it down to third man. Smoothly done
Umar Gul to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, back of a length and outside off, Misbah jabs it away in the direction of short third man

Umar Gul to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, Misbah goes downtown. He races down the track, takes a full ball, and clouts it over the bowler's head. Clean, clean strike. Sir Viv is ecstatic in the Quetta change room
Umar Gul to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, shortish and outside off, punched away.... but backward point ventures to his left and hunts it down
Umar Gul to Misbah-ul-Haq, 4 byes, bouncer outside off, Misbah jumps down the track, does not connect with a hook. The ball beats the keeper too. Byes
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, pushed through on the stumps, driven to long-on
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, FOUR, nicely tossed on the off stump, Misbah goes low and sweeps it away to the right of deep square leg. Top placement
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, Misbah moves away outside leg, the bowler follows him. Darted in, jabbed back
Hasan Khan to Misbah-ul-Haq, OUT, Hasan sends Misbah back. Slides in with the arm, too full for the sweep. Misbah stretches across, but can't connect and is pinned in front of off and middle
Hasan Khan to Watson, no run, full and hurtles in on leg stump, played back to Hasan
Hasan Khan to Watson, no run, quicker and flatter outside off, played back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, flat and arrowed in on off, worked away to wide mid-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, darted outside off, straight ball, beats Watson's punch
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, slides in on middle, punched back to the bowler now
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, fired outside off, Watson plays and misses
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, pushed through and angled in on middle, defended back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, very full for the sweep, Watson still goes for the shot and may have managed a bottom edge
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, down the track and drilled back to the bowler
Hasan Khan to Watson, 1 run, shortish and angled in on off, hangs back and forces to long-on
Hasan Khan to Billings, SIX, floaty full ball outside off, Billings races down the track and stylishly launches it straight over the bowler's head
Hasan Khan to Billings, 1 run, skids in flat, worked away to the leg side on the back foot
Hasan Khan to Watson, 1 run, pushed through outside off, back of a length, punched to long-off
Hasan Khan to Billings, no run, fired on off, punched back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run, short on off, jabbed away square towards point
Umar Gul to Billings, 1 run, off-stump yorker, which is whipped to midwicket
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR, full and just outside off, cracked away to the long-off fence
Umar Gul to Watson, FOUR, dug short and outside off, Watson pivots on the back foot and pulls over square leg. One-bounce four
Umar Gul to Watson, 1 run, length ball angled in, dragged away to deep midwicket
Umar Gul to Billings, no run, lifting short ball outside off, beats Billings' attempt to hook
Perera to Watson, SIX, Watson hits the roof. Bang. Slower length ball outside off, Watson picked it and dispatched it over midwicket. Bounces into the roof. What a way to bring up the hundred
Perera to Watson, 1 run, full and angling away outside off from around the wicket, slapped away to long-off
Perera to Billings, 1 run, slower awaycutter outside off, Billings opens the bat-face, dinks it to point, and acknowledges his fifty
Perera to Watson, 1 run, fuller and outside off, drops to one-knee and slices it away to deep cover
Perera to Billings, SIX, pretty full on the leg stump, Billings drops to one knee and shovel-sweeps the ball over long leg, despite the bottom hand flying off the bat, for a six
Perera to Billings, 1 run, overpitched and outside off, whiplashed away to wide long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Billings, 1 run, uses his feet and drives to long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, length ball outside off, punched into the covers
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, skids on off, played back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, 2 runs, turned away to midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, skids on outside off, leans back and punches to point
Mohammad Nawaz to Watson, no run, flat and slides on with the arm, pushed back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Billings, no run, slower ball outside off, Billings reaches out, swishes early and misses
Anwar Ali to Billings, no run, another slower short ball outside off, Billings throws his bat at the ball and mis-times it back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Billings, SIX, chest-high short ball on off, Billings is unperturbed. He rides the bounce and pulls superbly over long leg for a six
Anwar Ali to Billings, 1 run, full on the stumps, whittled into the leg side
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, another slower one on a fourth-stump line outside off. Watson swipes early to leg and does not make contact
Anwar Ali to Watson, no run, full on the stumps, hacked to square leg off the inside half
Perera to Billings, 1 run, back of the hand slower ball on off stump, slog-swept across the line to deep midwicket
Perera to Watson, FOUR, low full-toss on off, Watson stretches forward and crunches this in the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
Perera to Watson, FOUR, Watson beats long-off to his left now. This is overpitched outside off, Watson hits the half-volley on the up
Perera to Watson, SIX, Perera comes around the wicket. It does not matter at all. He smites it over the bowler's head. Watson goes 4,4,6

Perera to Watson, OUT, 4,4,6, and out! Holes out to deep midwicket. Can't clear the long boundary. Chest-high short ball on middle and leg stump, tucks Watson up for room. He does not get hold of the pull. Smart catch by Hasan at the edge of the boundary
Perera to Billings, 1 run, pitched up and outside off, Billings drive to cover and fetches the strike

Umar Gul to Billings, 2 runs, yorker on the leg stump, whipped away to deep midwicket. Billings hares across for the second. The keeper collects the throw and hits the stumps, but Billings was in. The throw from the deep wasn't great
Umar Gul to Billings, 1 bye
Wicket: ['SR Watson c Hasan Khan b Perera 36 (27b 4x4 2x6) SR: 133.33']

Commentary: Umar Gul to Asif Ali, 1 run, just short of a good length and angled in, tucked off the hips through square leg
Umar Gul to Billings, FOUR, pretty full and on off stump, Billings sits deep in the crease and whiplashes it away to the long-on fence. That's some shot
Umar Gul to Billings, 1 run, slower short ball on the leg stump, he swivels on the back foot and controls a pull to long leg
Umar Gul to Asif Ali, OUT, short ball, angled in at the ribs, Asif can't control the pull. He skies a top edge, which is gulped down by KP at long leg. Islamabad four away from victory
Perera to Billings, FOUR, Billings finishes it for Islamabad. Poor ball - full-toss outside off - Billings uses his wrists and shovels it away to the right of deep midwicket
